Text.Page:
Blast and damnation! These cursed Junaidar mercenaries can't work for a living, so they steal our crystals!

The attacks are getting worse. Shipments to Acarum are ambushedâ€”it's got to stop.

Hunt down and kill {@LinkCreature:34#410#Junaidar raiders}. Find Praetor Nunahd in Bleakrock when the deed is done.

So, ya gutted those Junaidar scum? Fine work. Could use a lot more help like that.

See, this region's rich in eldritch shards. Intriguing crystals, extremely useful for magical shields. Allemantheia pays a premium for them, as well they should!

I've got to get back to work. Thanks again!
